  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3379</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3379</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Joc de memòria</string>
            <string language="en">A memory game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Speicherspiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu de mémoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo da memória</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco di memoria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι μνήμης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc de cercar parelles de cartes amb il·lustracions. Té sis nivells de dificultat, i a cada nivell va augmentant la quantitat de peces.</string>
            <string language="en">A game where pupils must pair off picture cards. There are six levels of difficulty, each with a larger number of cards.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">orientació</string>
            <string language="en">gear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">memorització</string>
            <string language="en">memorization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">joc</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
            <string language="es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel, wo Pupillen weg von den Abbildung 
Karten zusammenpassen müssen. Es gibt sechs Stufen 
Schwierigkeit, jede mit einer größeren Anzahl von Karten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu où les pupilles doivent appareiller outre
des cartes d'image. Il y a six niveaux de difficulté, chacune 
avec un plus grand nombre de cartes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo onde as pupilas devem se emparelhar fora 
dos cartões do retrato. Há seis níveis da dificuldade, cada 
uma com um número maior dos cartões.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco dove le pupille devono accoppiare fuori 
delle schedi dell'immagine. Ci sono sei livelli della 
difficoltà, ciascuno con un più grande numero di schedi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι όπου οι μαθητές πρέπει να ζευγαρώσουν 
από τις κάρτες εικόνων. Υπάρχουν έξι επίπεδα δυσκολίας, 
κάθε ένα με έναν μεγαλύτερο αριθμό καρτών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahnrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Memorieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mémorisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atenção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">engrenagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">memorization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attenzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ingranaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">memorizzazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εργαλείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποστήθιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
